pageSetting.title: 中间业务业绩分配日志

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZJYW'

select.isEqual: select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

select rz.jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_posshdjb jxdx on jxdx.shdh=rz.hth and jxdx.shdh like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.shdh, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_wyqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

select rz.jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_wyqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_posshdjb jxdx on jxdx.shdh=rz.hth and jxdx.shdh like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.shdh, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc
select rz.jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_sjyhqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc
select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_posshdjb jxdx on jxdx.shdh=rz.hth and jxdx.shdh like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.shdh, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc
select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_wyqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and rz.xgrdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc
select rz.jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jxdx.khmc, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq ,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_wyqy jxdx on jxdx.hth=rz.hth and jxdx.hth like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.hth, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc
select F_TIMETOCHAR(rz.jlsj,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') jlsj, case when jl.ggbz='0' then '旧数据' else '修改后' end as jlbz, $ywlx$ as ywlx, rz.hth, jg1.jgdh, jg1.jgmc, hy.hydh, hy.hymc, '百分比:' || F_NumToChar(jl.zlbl) as fpgx, jl.qsrq, jl.jsrq, jg.jgmc qyjg, jxdx.qyrq, jxdx.jyzh, jxdx.cxrq zxrq,czlxms.dmms as czlx from xtb_hygxrz_dzyh rz inner join xtb_hygxjl_dzyh jl on jl.jldh=rz.jldh inner join csb_sjw sjw on sjw.tjrq between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ inner join khdx_jgcy jgcy on jgcy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh and sjw.tjrq between jgcy.qsrq and jgcy.jsrq inner join pas.khdx_jg jg1 on jgcy.jgkhdxdh = jg1.khdxdh and jg1.zxrq >= $jsrq$ inner join jxdx_posshdjb jxdx on jxdx.shdh=rz.hth and jxdx.shdh like '%$qyh$%' inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.jgdh = jxdx.jgdh inner join pas.khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh = jl.khdxdh inner join pas.khdx_hy czy on czy.khdxdh = rz.xgrdh inner join csb_dmms czlxms on lower(czlxms.dmmc)='rzczlx' and rz.czlx=czlxms.dmz where 1=1 and jl.khdxdh=$khdxdh$ and sjw.tjrq=f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') and f_timetoint(rz.jlsj, 'yyyymmdd') between $qsrq$ and $jsrq$ order by rz.jlsj desc,jxdx.shdh, jl.jldh, jl.ggbz asc ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where dmmc='ZJYW'
